content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) facing DOWN (connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (16.0,73.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (17.5,70.5) (facing furnace, has fuel)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,76.5) (output storage)
- Output inserter at (16.5,75.5) (connects furnace to chest)

### New Mining Setup at (20.5,20.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (20.5,20.5) facing RIGHT (not connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (23.0,20.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at (20.5,24.5) (output storage)

### Power Generation System at (-11.5,69.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-11.5,69.5) (working, producing water)
- Boiler at (-6.5,70.0) (now has fuel)
- Steam engine at (-2.5,70.5) (now connected to power network)
- Pipe network connecting water system (positions: (-11.5,68.5), (-10.5,68.5), (-9.5,68.5), (-9.5,69.5), (-8.5,69.5), (-8.5,70.5))
- Steam pipe network (positions: (-5.5,67.5), (-4.5,67.5), (-3.5,67.5), (-2.5,67.5), (-6.5,68.5), (-5.5,68.5))

### New Coal Mining Setup at (15.0,15.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (15.0,15.0) facing RIGHT (has fuel, output blocked)
- Stone furnace at (18.0,15.0) (has fuel, no ingredients)
- Missing inserter between drill and furnace (attempted at 16.5,15.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Distance-related placement failures (persistent)
- Multiple placement attempts while too far from target (steps 24,26,30)
- Solution:
  - Always move within 10 tiles before placement attempts
  - Implement distance checks before placement
  - Group nearby construction tasks together

### Water terrain placement issues (ongoing)
- Continued drill placement failures in water areas (steps 25,27,28)
- Solution:
  - Use map view to verify land positions
  - Avoid coordinates ending in .5 near water boundaries
  - Implement terrain validation before placement

### Entity reference errors
- Attempting to reference non-existent inserters (step 31)
- Solution:
  - Verify entity exists before attempting operations
  - Store placed entity references for later use
  - Implement error handling for missing entities

### Setup configuration issues
- New mining setup at (15.0,15.0) has blocked output
- Solution:
  - Clear output area before activating drills
  - Verify complete material flow path
  - Add output chest/transport system

### Power system improvements
- Steam system now operational but underutilized
- Solution:
  - Connect more consumers to power network
  - Monitor fuel levels in boiler
  - Consider expanding power generation capacity

### Inserter placement challenges
- Continued inserter positioning difficulties
- Solution:
  - Plan inserter positions before placing furnaces
  - Leave adequate spacing between components
  - Verify all positions are clear before placement
